content:
Attached is the Dockerfile. It was and still is in the root directory. I also attached the requirements file. I see you built in the deployment process, but we need to push to GitHub as well and that has a Workflow set up for deployment that we've used successfully. I'm not sure if that needs to be adjusted at all or not though. 

jesselarose@Jesses-MacBook-Pro palios-taey-nova % ./fix_deployment.sh

Starting fixes for deployment issues...
Created Dockerfile in root directory.
Updated build_push.sh script.
requirements.txt already exists.
Updated prepare_deploy.sh to use python3 instead of python.
